member.name: T:CimTools.Workshop.Changelog
member.summary:
Used for grabbing change logs from the Steam Workshop. This will automatically get the most recent change log on the page and return it in either a list or a string.
The workshop changelogs must be formatted in a specific way in order for them to be correctly formatted when getting the output from the class. Every change must be within [list][/list] tags with [*] before each item when entering them into the workshop.
